text: Anomaloglossus megacephalus is a frog. Scientists found it in Guyana. ==Body== The adult female frog can be as big as 28.3 mm long from nose to rear end. ==Home== This frog is awake during the day. It lives near streams in forests where the tree branches come together like a roof. It lives high on tepui flatlands. Scientists saw it between 1060 and 1490 meters above sea level. ==Young== Scientists do not know where the female frog lays her eggs. After the eggs hatch, the adult frogs carry the tadpoles to streams. ==Danger== Scientists do not know if this frog is in danger. It lives in a place where most human beings do not go, but some people dig for gold there, and this can hurt frogs. ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Anomaloglossus megacephalus
